content:

title: Re: A ripped sprite in Cosmo's Cosmc Adventure???
content:
Cool find, haven't noticed that before! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Yeah, they look kinda same, but I don't think the other team has ripped another's work.
Or if has, then Cosmo team has ripped Keen team. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mort.gif[/img] You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: haha
content: I loved the music on Level 9 in episode 1... my favorite Cosmo song.  Those worms were all over the place on that level, and I always felt bad for squishing them.  :-(

title: Re: haha
content: They were? I only remember a slug in level 2 and 5. hmm..[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/genius314/picturekeen.bmp[/img]

content:

title: Re: haha
content:
Cosmo 2+3 is basically Cosmo 1 with new levels (and only one new monster).

The Cosmo 3 boss is the same boss from Cosmo 1 which really sucks. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img]

You're not missing much though.[img]http://www.geocities.com/miniopolis/soul.txt[/img]

title: buh?
content: Probably Ep2, then... oops.  :-(  Sorry.  It's been a while since I played through Cosmo.  I can tolerate Ep1 okay, but every time I try to do Ep2 or 3, I get fed up with the monster's stomach levels.
